comment:
* Responsible for fling behavior. Use {@link #start(int)} to
     * initiate a fling. Each frame of the fling is handled in {@link #run()}.
     * A FlingRunnable will keep re-posting itself until the fling is done.
     *

variables.name: mScroller
variables.comment: * Tracks the decay of a fling scroll

variables.name: mLastFlingY
variables.comment: * Y value reported by mScroller on the previous fling

variables.name: mSuppressIdleStateChangeCall
variables.comment:
* If true, {@link #endFling()} will not report scroll state change to
         * {@link OnScrollListener#SCROLL_STATE_IDLE}.

methods.name: void startScroll(int distance, int duration, boolean linear, boolean suppressEndFlingStateChangeCall)
void endFling()
methods.comment: To interrupt a fling early you should use smoothScrollBy(0,0) instead

methodNames: void startScroll(int distance, int duration, boolean linear, boolean suppressEndFlingStateChangeCall)
